pooling_details.ima_ssa_name: Norfolk County-8 Local Public Health Coalition

engagement_descriptions.families_impacted_other: Design Team from the Milton Health Department is engaging in active planning of a community workshop in FY 25 and a member of the design team was impacted by a family member who struggled with substance misuse.
engagement_descriptions.subject_matter_experts_other: Contacted Care mass to discuss hiring a consult to conduct a community workshop, listening sessions, focus groups and conduct a Milton survey. Pooling money within NC-8 to hire a recovery coach and provide Narcan training.
engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_who_use_drugs: The Health Department has engaged with social media to reach out to Milton residents. We have the Milton Coalition as a resource and that reduces barriers.
engagement_descriptions.barriers_people_in_recovery: The Health Department reached out to the faith community and recovery centers to advertise for the FY 25 Workshop. Milton has a Community Health Social worker who works with people in recovery to provide resources.

disparities_assessment.other_methods: A community workshop in FY25 will assess gaps and needs.

behavioral_health_assessment.admin_data_sources: Collecting the data in FY 25, FY 26
behavioral_health_assessment.other_methods: Collecting the data in FY 25, FY 26
behavioral_health_assessment.barriers: Collecting the data in FY 25, FY 26

planning.process: Our municipality conducted its own planning process. We engaged in shared planning with other municipalities. We contracted a consultant to support this process. We consulted with Care Mass.

recovery_support.barriers: Monthly meetings with NC-8 to discuss pooling money to support a recovery coach and narcan training

harm_reduction.barriers: NC-8 pooling the monies to have Narcan training, Train the Trainer

additional_comments.general: Milton has hired a health consultant to facilitate a workshop in FY 25 with follow up focus groups, stakeholder interviews and planning processes to take place.
additional_comments.unmet_needs: Milton has not expended any funds thus far.
